column1: 1989 APA/WPA NORTHEASTERN UNITED STATES BENCH PRESS
December 2, 1989 - Yankee Fitness Center - Plymouth, New Hampshire
Best Lifter Northeastern US Meet: Louie Tseramis
Best Lifter Submaster: Frank Palmer    Best Lifter Master: Ron Sakaguchi
Judges: Scott Taylor, Pete Stanley, Gary Vezina, Dan Harvie, Steve Walso,
Meet Time: 3 hrs 48 minutes (This was before computer meet programs were invented!
Results also posted in Powerlifting USA magazine, page 55, March 1990 issue
